name: Madorica Real Estate
description: Unique escape room game that uses pen & paper. Search for hints, jot down notes on the maps, and seek out magic to exorcise all the ghosts to escape!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8.1 Processor: Intel core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 1GB ,AMD HD 6850 1GB Storage: 149 MB available space
